Posts.EditableText:
Hey I made a gamebook with audio and pictures.
The audio and pictures are all in the same folder as the save file. In the editing window, running the game plays the audio and displays the graphics. However when I publish my game the audio plays when I try playing the standalone game but the pictures are not there?
Any help or advice? Is it the file size of the pictures?
Posts.HTML:
Hey I made a gamebook with audio and pictures.
The audio and pictures are all in the same folder as the save file. In the editing window, running the game plays the audio and displays the graphics. However when I publish my game the audio plays when I try playing the standalone game but the pictures are not there?
Any help or advice? Is it the file size of the pictures?
